Synopsis: Exports Group Policy Objects (GPOs) to XML or HTML files.
Description: This function exports GPOs to either XML or HTML files based on the specified parameters.
Notes: This function exports GPOs to XML or HTML files for further analysis or backup purposes.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Export-GPOZaurrContent -FolderOutput "C:\ExportedGPOs" -ReportType HTML
Exports all GPOs to HTML format and saves them in the "C:\ExportedGPOs" folder.
